long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless LinkedIn Integration for HubSpot – Now with AI Insights!

Transform your LinkedIn experience with the ultimate HubSpot LinkedIn integration. Save time, stay organized, and focus on what matters most – building relationships and closing deals.

Key Features:
- Instant Visibility: See at a glance which LinkedIn profiles are already in your HubSpot.
- One-Click Import: Effortlessly save LinkedIn profiles into your HubSpot CRM with a single click.
- Customizable Workflows: Set preferences so profiles are saved exactly how you want.
- In-Depth Data Access: View and edit profiles, activities, emails, and tasks directly from LinkedIn.
- NEW – AI Insights: Leverage AI-powered recommendations and insights to prioritize leads, improve decision-making, and close deals faster.

With LinkMatch, connecting LinkedIn to HubSpot has never been easier. Whether you're a sales professional or recruiter, maximize your LinkedIn sourcing potential today!


By installing this Chrome Extension you agree to the Terms of Service - linkmatch.net/terms
______

Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn or Xing launched to show notification if needed
- cookies: to be able to make API calls to HubSpot Web API
- https://*.hubapi.com/* - to be able to make requests to HubSpot REST API
- https://*.hubspot.com/* a- - to be able to make requests to HubSpot Web API
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to xing
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
